reviewText: This was given as a  gift to my Father on his 94th. birthday. He served in the Merchant Marines during WW11. He said it was a very accurate portrayal of his service time in the war. Fast shipping. Item as described.

My dad was a Merchant Seaman during WWII. He really liked this documentary, even though he was blissfully unaware while serving that the Merchant Marines were looked down upon for a while.
This documentary proves that Merchant Seaman were just as courageous as any soldier and deserve the benefits that were refused to them for so long.
